**Be Cool Stock Nuke**

Stock Nuke the way you wish it was - from the folks at UberDyne Astronautics.

**Features**

Stock Nuke made more usable, LV-N made surface mountable. This means you can make a cluster that conducts heat from multiple engines into a single tank - you can have moar thrust for longer.

Also three versions of the classic orange tank that are all LiquidFuel and nothing but LiquidFuel to use with the new Nuke.

It's as stock as it can be. Oxidizer and Liquid Fuel have the same density - so the big orange tank holds 6400 Liquid Fuel. The only Nuke change is the name and it's surface mount-ability.

**Download**

*[removed link to defunct website]*

**Installation**

Just extract the UberDyneAstronautics folder into GameData. Requires ModuleManager. BSD Licensed.
